string.text: how may I help you?
I did all what you asked for.
Security camp
to Destroy the group "Monolith", which represents a threat to the mercenary camp

we Have on-site mutants divorced, the mud, attack our positions, it is necessary to clean the sector from a congestion of monsters.

Military exercises

it is Necessary to conduct the ordinary soldiers of the APU in the area that they have worked shooting skills, it is desirable to drive where a lot of mutants, they will need to search the bodies of mutants and enemies.

greetings commander! We were told that you will lead us to practice the skills of shooting, lead us to the battlefield, preferably where mutants more and Bandos all, they we're potreniruemsya, you just follow the battle and try not to intervene unnecessarily, we need to learn how to survive in the Area, and of the trophies of monsters too we collect.

it was a campaign captain! Here, this is from us to you in gratitude.
good Luck soldiers.

it is Necessary to conduct beginners Svoboda in the area that they have worked shooting skills, it is desirable to drive where a lot of mutants, they will need to search the bodies of mutants and enemies.

Conduct of the scientists
you Need to hold scientists to a particular place and to ensure their safety while they conduct research, and then bring them back to the camp.

a Colleague group of our scientists need an experienced guide. You need to hold them to their destination and back unharmed. Such expeditions are very frequent, so that you can become our regular conductor, take measurements and come back soon! I'll wait for you with a group.

you Know, we have started interruptions in the supply of normal products, sometimes on an empty stomach impossible to tune to study! I decided to try to cook something edible meat from the local fauna, could you bring me the meat of some animal?

the Bandits are stalkers sitting in the liver! old score: 45 stripes! You have to beat and collect %s. if you break the record and get a specified number, then the prize is yours!
Congratulations to the champion! And the Area from the bandits cleaned and the competition won! Good job.

Now record 58 stripes! You have to beat and collect %s. if you break the record and get a specified number, then the prize is yours!

congratulations, you won the hunt, the prize is yours.
